reference.title: Automated Workflow Trigger Configuration Reference
reference.shortdesc: This reference details the configuration parameters for the Automated Workflow Trigger, enabling administrators to define conditions and actions for automated workflows in SecureNova.

section.title: Configuration Parameters
section.p: The Automated Workflow Trigger supports a range of settings to customize how workflows respond to critical events, such as internet blackouts or database data loss. Use these parameters in Workflow Studio to set up triggers.

row.entry: Specifies the critical event that activates the trigger, such as Internet Blackout, Database Data Loss, or Server Failure.
Sets the urgency of the trigger, with options including High, Medium, or Low. High priority ensures immediate action.
Configures the delivery method for alerts, such as Email, SMS, or SecureNova Notification.

section.title: Troubleshooting Tips
section.p: If a trigger fails to activate, verify the Event Type matches the monitoring system or check the System Logs for configuration errors. For further assistance, contact SecureNova support via the Admin Portal.
